chat_history.content:
Based on my research, here are the first championships for each Philadelphia team:

MLB: The Philadelphia Athletics won the city's first World Series championship in 1910. The Philadelphia Phillies won their first World Series in 1980.

NBA: The Philadelphia Warriors won the city's first NBA championship in 1947. After the Warriors moved to San Francisco, the Philadelphia 76ers (formerly Syracuse Nationals) won their first championship as a Philadelphia team in 1967.

NFL: The Philadelphia Eagles won their first NFL Championship in 1948 (pre-Super Bowl era). Their first Super Bowl victory came in Super Bowl LII (2018) when they defeated the New England Patriots.

NHL: The Philadelphia Flyers won their first Stanley Cup in 1974, becoming the first expansion team to win the NHL championship.

These victories represent significant moments in Philadelphia sports history, with each team contributing to the city's rich sporting legacy.
